snippet: One Republican member of the Federal Election Commission is maneuvering to keep the agency from doing its job.
abstract: Editorial states Donald McGahn, who is departing Federal Election Commission as Republican vice chairman, is maneuvering to keep the agency from doing its job in policing campaign abuses and is threatening its integrity.
lead_paragraph: One Republican member of the Federal Election Commission is maneuvering to keep the agency from doing its job.

headline.main: A New Danger to Campaign Law
headline.print_headline: A New Danger to Campaign Law
